main.name: Kelvin Njenga
main.description: I am a Software engineer and I use Java and the Spring Framework to develop production ready applications. I have defined much more down below of my abilities and skills with an aspiration of working together really soon on some cool projects
main.bio: My name is Kelvin Njenga, a Software Developer by profession. Throughout my Software development journey I have gained commendable experience in Application software development and EMV payments Software development.
main.contactmessage: My phone and email address are always open for communication. I sincerely look foward to hearing from you soon.

resume.skillmessage: I am vastly knowledable in the most commonly used frameworks and technologies as detailed in my resume. Below is a breif skills gauge of my comfortability using common development tools and frameworks.

education.description: I mostly majored on software development and i developed a full fledged android application for my school project.
Gained professional skills to apply in an actual work enviroment aside from academic skills  .

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Currently at DIL I'm a software engineer using C and JAVA programming languages to mainly develop EMV Level 3 certified Point of Sale applications. I also use JAVA and the spring boot framework to develop internal REST-APIs for POS devices. In the year 2020 at data integrated, I was taking lead in development for VISA Device acceptance certification. This was for ADVT and CDET retail and transit device certification. I successfully passed all test cases and the POS devices were determined to be VISA EMV Level 3 certified for retail and transit.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Launched and produced K-wallet, a product that served as a payment wallet for fuel and lubricant payments used by RUBIS energy (KenolKobil) customers. I was the senior POS application developer responsible for implementations of Smart POS device features.

work.title: Android Developer
work.description: Worked at Vortex Solution as an android developer using JAVA 8 as part of my career development program. I was part of a team that developed an inventory management application.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: I personally have an active repository to personal projects some private and others are public. I also contribute to open source projects whenever possible.
